characteristics.climate: Temperate, with hot summers and cold winters
characteristics.precipitation: Moderate, with more rainfall in the east
elements: Earth Immovable foundation, embodying strength and permanence.
Air Invisible force of life, carrier of whispers and secrets.
Sunstone Stone of joy, the light inspirer, and the harnesser of the sun's energy.
Water Flowing lifeblood of the world, master of adaptation and change.
Wood Silent witness of time, carrier of life's cycle of growth and decay.
Life Sacred breath of existence, master of growth and healing.
Freedom Untamed wind, the spirit that cannot be caged.
Peridot Gem of sun's tears, harbinger of growth, prosperity, and psychological clarity.
